nodes.text: The Fondor system contained the planet of Fondor, homeworld of the Fondorians, its moon Nallastia, Thanut, and the cognominal star—which, as one of the brightest bodies in the starscape, made the system easy to locate without sensors. It was in the Freeworlds Territory of the Tapani sector.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the Fondor system was the theater of a battle concluded with a Republic victory.
